Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Reception Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Outdoor Pool Area Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Exterior Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Sauna Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Bedroom Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Dining Area Ultiqa Shearwater Resort Bathroom Sunshine Coast ULTIQA Shearwater Resort &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Nestled along the stunning coastline of the Sunshine Coast, ULTIQA Shearwater Resort offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Located just steps away from the iconic Kings Beach in Caloundra, the resort provides spacious apartments with modern amenities and a relaxed atmosphere for couples, families, and groups alike. Whether you’re looking to unwind by the pool, explore the local attractions, or enjoy the vibrant dining scene in Caloundra, ULTIQA Shearwater Resort is your ideal destination for a memorable beachside escape. View more View less 7 nights + flights from $ 1309 per person share twin Flying with Jetstar Enquire now Sale Period : until 17 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar from Auckland to Maroochydore (includes 20kg checked bag & seat selection, per person) 7 nights accommodation FREE Wi-Fi Welcome hamper Room Types Departs From Auckland from Auckland One Bedroom Apartment 1 x queen bed Auckland 7 night package from $1309 per person share twin Additional night from $115 per person share twin Departs Tuesdays, Fridays & Sundays Travel 27 Jan - 03 Feb 26, 15 Feb - 31 Mar 26, 03 May - 23 Jun 26 Please note the room images displayed are suggestive only as the apartments are individually owned and furnished. Sunshine Coast sightseeing optional add-ons Sunshine Coast Hinterland Scenic Culinary Experience This Hinterland Scenic Food & Wine tour includes local cheese tasting in Maleny, a fabulous 2-Course lunch, cellar door wine tasting and a visit to the quaint Hinterland village of Montville, finally a touch of luxury with a sample box of handmade Belgian Chocolate. Includes: 2 course lunch. Free time to explore Maleny township. Stunning views of the Glass House Mountains. Cellar door flight of wine. Sample box of handmade Belgian chocolates (1 box per person). Sample of local and inernational cheeses. All transportation. Operates: Tuesday, Friday, Sunday Opening hours: Departs 7.45am-9.00am Returns 5.30pm--6.30pm Price from $309 per adult, $145 per child (3-14 years) One-Hour Amphibious Aquaduck Tour of the Sunshine Coast If you’re trying to choose between taking a bus tour or a boat tour of the Sunshine Coast you don’t have to with an amphibious Aquaduck tour. The one-hour tour starts with a land tour around Mooloolaba and then the duck becomes a boat and tours around the canals, and waterways. Learn more about the history and culture of the Sunshine Coast from the commentary and enjoy the excitement of riding in this special vehicle. Includes: Kids drive the duck & get a captains certificate 1 hour city tour and river cruise Operates: Daily except Christmas day Time: 9.30am, 10.45am, 12.00pm, 2.00pm, 3.15pm, 4.30pm Duration: 1 hour Price from $65 per adult and $49 per child (2-16 years) Mooloolaba Sunset Cruise - 1 Hour Tour As the setting sun slowly slips behind the majestic Blackall Mountain Range to the west of Mooloolaba you will be cruising comfortably through the waterways onboard the Mooloolaba Canal Cruise. Your Skipper will provide an entertaining commentary while the glass fronted waterside mansions reflect the setting sun as you discover Mooloolaba from the water. We'll see all of the highlights the area has to offer including Steve Irwin's famous vessel Croc One, Mooloolah Island, Minyama Island, the Kawana Canal System as well as La Balsa Park, a local favourite. Then out to the river heads where we turn the boat around to take in the breathtaking views of the coastline from Mooloolaba Beach right up to Noosa Heads. Includes: Take the helm and drive the boat along side our friendly skipper Take in the sights, sounds, and sun as you glide along the pretty Sunshine Coast Soak up the sea air and views with friends over a spectacular sunset backdrop Listen to entertaining commentary from your skipper while you sit back and relax On-board restrooms See Steve Irwin's famous vessel, Croc One Operates: Departs daily except some public holidays Time: 5pm Duration: 1 hour Price from $40 per adult and $26 per child (3-14 years) Sunshine Coast Hinterland Noosa Day Tour Inc Eumundi Markets This tour is ideal for travellers who want to see a lot of the Sunshine Coast Hinterland in one day. Get out of the city and travel with a small group to see a ton of highlights including iconic beaches, markets and artisan villages Includes: Bottled water Driver/guide In-vehicle air conditioning Live commentary on board Operates: Wednesday and Saturday Time: 7.45am Duration: 9.5 hours Price from $185 per adult and $139 per child (5-12 years) Golden Beach 1-Hour Stand Up Paddleboard Hire on the Sunshine Coast Just south of the Sunshine Coast is Bribie Island National Park, a quieter, unsullied remedy to the resorts and beach crowds upstate. Drift across the crystal-clear Pumicestone Passage and explore Bribie Island’s beaches and lagoons on this short paddleboard hire. Launch from nearby Golden Beach and paddle around Bribie Island at your own pace. Includes: 1-hour paddle board hire All safety equipment, instruction and paddles are provided with your hire. Operates: Daily Time: 8.00am until 3.00pm Duration: 1 hour Price from $35 per adult (8-80yrs) Ginger Factory and Nutworks Return Bus Transfer: Sunshine Coast Perfect for families and couples, the Ginger Factory offers something special for everyone. Adults can indulge in tranquil gardens and rainforest walks, while children enjoy playful and educational activities. Forget traffic and parking woes - our air-conditioned buses ensure a seamless journey from your doorstep to the Ginger Factory. Enjoy 2 hours and 30 minutes of free time to explore attractions suitable for all ages and interests, from botanical beauty to culinary delights. With a scheduled itinerary, you’ll have ample time to savour everything without feeling rushed. Includes: Round-Trip Transportation: Enjoy comfortable and convenient round-trip transport from your doorstep In-vehicle air conditioning Pickup Services Tailored to Guests: The service is designed to accommodate both families and couples 2 Hours and 30 Minutes of Free Time at the Ginger Factory Operates: Wednesdays and Saturdays Time: 9am Duration: 3 hours Price from $55 per adult and $45 per child (3-14 years) Maleny & Montville Wine Tasting Tour: Noosa See the scenic landscapes of the Montville-Maleny region of Sunshine Coast from the comfort of a luxury, air-conditioned vehicle. Let your local host tell you all about the views and the history of this tourist-friendly area of Noosa. See the rainforest and visit the towns’ many unique arts and crafts boutiques and gift shops. Taste local wine and locally-made chocolates, and enjoy the hospitality of both towns. Includes: Commentary throughout the day from experienced host Montville Artisan Village with plenty of time to explore All-inclusive tour with award-winning Joel's Journeys Noosa, Queensland and Australia Top Tour Guide Panoramic views of Glass House Mountains and Sunshine Coast Door to door pick-up and drop-off at your home or accommodation Alcoholic beverages Tea and coffee Guided walk through remnant old-growth rainforest with birds, wallabies & giant trees Comfort of a luxury vehicle with reclining seats, individual USB ports, air-conditioning & heating Chocolate tasting of handmade Belgian chocolates Lunch Sightseeing and stunning ridgeline drives Operates: Daily (except public holidays) Time: 9am Duration: 9 hours Price from $335 per adult and $165 per child (4-16 years) Bribie Island North Sigle or Double Kayak Rental Adventure A great way to spend a free day on the Sunshine Coast, you can embark on an adventure to Nth Bribie Island during this kayaking experience. Within minutes, you can reach this paradise where deserted beaches, a national park, and one of the world's largest sand islands await. Pack your picnic essentials and set off to explore the island's wonders like tidal lagoons teeming with marine life. Paddling through the Pumice stone Passage, encounter jellyfish, sea cucumbers, and shorebirds. Includes: Kayak, Paddles and Safety Gear - lifejackets (optional) Operates: D aily except some public holidays Time: departures from 9.00am until 2.00pm Duration: 1 hours Price from $46 per adult - (double kayak 2 adults) Price from $25 per adult - (single kayak) Noosa Whale Watching On Ocean Kayaks & Beach 4X4 Tour Prepare to embark on an extraordinary journey into the pristine waters of Double Island Point with our most unique Whale Watching Ocean Kayak Tour. This experience offers an unbelievable opportunity to encounter the ocean's most majestic creatures in their natural environment the eco way on ocean kayaks. Guided by our knowledgeable team, you will gain insight into the fascinating lives of these majestic marine mammals and their natural habitat. Our whale watching tours provide frequent encounters with these magnificent marine creatures, although sightings are not guaranteed. The unpredictable nature of wildlife, especially whales, means each tour is a unique experience shaped by natural elements beyond our control. We encourage guests to come with an open mind, ready to explore the vast beauty of the National Park. tours offer opportunities to observe a diverse array of wildlife, including dolphins, turtles, rays, and seabirds, enhancing the richness of your adventure. Includes: Whale Watching Swimming Double Island Point Water Snacks 4X4 Beach Drive Experience Fully guided kayak & wildlife tour Noosa North Shore & Tewantin Ferry Kayaking equipment Great Sandy National Park Operates: June-October Time: Departure times can vary depending on the day Duration: 6 hours Price from $199 per adult (6yrs +) Sunshine Coast Small-Group Wine Tasting Tour with Lunch Explore the Hinterlands of the Sunshine Coast on this small-group tour that includes stops at a winery, distillery, cheesemaker, and more, with samples along the way. Enjoy a private wine tasting and eat local cheeses, before lunch at a local restaurant with stunning mountain views. Finish the half-day tour with a “Cheers” over craft spirits with your new friends. Includes: In-vehicle air conditioning Lunch Alcoholic beverages Operates: Friday, Saturdays & Sundays Time: 11am Duration: 6 hours Price from $325 per adult Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only from 09 -17 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax and surcharge increases • Full payment is required at time of booking • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability • Package prices are based on return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar to Sunshine Coast from Auckland • Economy class fares include 20kg checked bag and seat selection, per person • Flights are restricted to selected day of the week schedules • Flights from Auckland to Sunshine Coast depart Tuesday, Friday & Sunday in both directions • Day of the week surcharges may apply • Min/max stays apply • Share twin is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 28 Sep 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
